themes.description: Reviews expressing overall satisfaction or positive general feedback about the platform's features, usability, or experience.
This theme covers requests or feedback related to existing or new features, data availability, and overall functionality of the application.
This theme covers reviews related to alleged fraud, scamming, unauthorized access, data breaches, or other security-related issues.
Covers general user satisfaction, ease of use, and overall sentiment about the application.
Covers suggestions for new features, enhancements, or missing functionalities within the application.
This theme covers complaints about the difficulty or complexity of specific in-app processes, such as selling stocks or generating PINs, indicating a need for smoother user flows.
This theme covers problems related to account activation, deactivation, login, access, and general account management.
Concerns related to data collection, privacy practices, document submission, and personal information handling.
Reviews expressing satisfaction, appreciation, or general positive sentiment about the app or service.
Requests for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or suggestions for additional information display and specific user group support within the application.
Concerns related to the application's design, layout, navigation, and overall ease of use.
Covers issues and requests related to managing personal account details, KYC, and profile settings.
Encompasses suggestions and issues related to specific trading functionalities, tools, and options within the platform.
Issues related to the accurate tracking, transfer, and display of investment units, funds, and assets, including discrepancies after transactions.
Concerns about the platform's trustworthiness, security of funds, and allegations of fraudulent activity or holding user money.
Requests for specific account details, statements, or historical data.
General positive feedback about the application's features, ease of use, or overall experience.
This theme covers feedback related to the overall usability, interface design, navigation, and ease of interaction with the application.
This theme covers issues or requests related to the app's performance, display, and functionality across different devices or screen orientations.
This theme covers complaints related to the user interface design, visual presentation, layout, and overall user experience, including display errors or poor aesthetics.
This theme covers feedback related to how financial data, returns, investments, and other portfolio information are presented and reported within the application.
This theme addresses issues related to the application's compatibility, display, and optimization across various devices, operating systems, or screen sizes.
This theme covers feedback, requests, or complaints regarding the availability and variety of investment products, services, or asset classes offered by the platform.
This theme includes feedback on the overall user experience, interface design, navigation, and device-specific optimization of the application.
This theme covers feedback related to the application's visual appearance, user interface (UI), aesthetics, and overall design.
This theme covers feedback related to the range and availability of investment products, instruments, or asset classes offered by the platform.
General feedback or opinions on the overall trading experience, suitability for different trading styles, or limitations of the platform.

This theme covers issues related to incorrect, missing, or misleading information provided within the application. It also includes complaints about the general utility or helpfulness of the app's content.
This theme covers general accusations of fraudulent activity, untrustworthiness, or unethical practices by the service or application. It reflects a loss of confidence in the platform's integrity.
Issues or limitations related to account management features like nominee addition, profile updates, or account settings.
Problems related to Know Your Customer (KYC) verification, status, or options for renewal/completion.
This theme covers feedback related to the platform's ability to provide useful insights, recommendations, or tools for stock picking and investment decisions.
Reviews discussing the app's general usefulness, suitability for specific purposes, or overall positive impression.
This theme covers complaints about the absence of expected or desired functionalities within the application.
